page.title: 12LIFE AT A VILLAGE SCHOOL.
page.content: My name is{Helen Cornish}and I am 11 years old. My alarm went off at 7:30 today because I'm going to school.I listen to my radio until 7:50 then I get up and put on my school uniform , which is a grey skirt, a white blouse and a tie which is red and grey.Then I have to make my packed lunch which consists of two sandwiches,a packet of crisps and an orange.As I walk up to my friend (Julies) house,who walks to school with me,I pass the post office where I post my mums letters. When I reach school I hang up my coat and bag and put my lunch in a big box with everyone elses. We lead into our classes after our bell rings and we line up. In class Mr Frampton takes the register to see how many children are at class 4 today. At school we do maths and English,and topic themes such as people,transport or farming.
